nodes.text: A Plinovian ambassador represented his species in negotiations with the Solodoe regarding the terraforming of the planet Plin Minor. When the Jedi diplomat Arath Tarrex stole the seal of office of Ketas, the Solodoe ambassador, Ketas accused the Plinovian of the theft. The Plinovian ambassador was angered by the accusation, and self-combusted in an explosion that almost killed Ketas.
